response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I am offering it to you at a special price considering its significance to both of us. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $1,200,000. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while allowing us to reach a fair agreement. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of making this transaction a reality.", "product_price": 1200000}
